name: .AUTOPLAY
summary: Learn about .AUTOPLAY files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can open AUTOPLAY files with Indigo Rose AutoPlay Media Studio in Windows. To open an AUTOPLAY file, select File â†’ Open.

Since AUTOPLAY files are saved in XML format, you can also open them with a plain text or XML editor. However, opening an AUTOPLAY file in this manner will not appear the same as if opening it with AutoPlay Media Studio.

AutoPlay Media Studio (version 8 and later) can convert AUTOPLAY files to Autoplay Media Studio Exported Project (.APZ) files and Autoplay Media Studio Template (.APT) files. The software can also build AUTOPLAY files as Windows Executable (.EXE) files and Disk Image (.ISO) files.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .autoplay file in Indigo Rose AutoPlay Media Studio 9
images.caption: AUTOPLAY file open in Indigo Rose AutoPlay Media Studio 9
